name: JUMP & RUN (tanvir-shanto)
description:
Welcome to JUMP & RUN, a short and simple 2D tile based platformer made with love2D. I am a fairly new developer and this is actually the first game I'm publishing. 

The assets which are not mine, I have given proper attribution for them in game. And also in the "credits.txt" file in the game.

Controls:

Press left and right keys to move left or right and press up key to perform a jump.
